sentences.sContent: When he spoke I was expected to reciprocate with some remark of my own.
sentences.sCn: 他在说话时，我也应该说点什么回应他。

remMethod.val: 来自reciproc (al) (相互的) + ate → 互给

words.tran: 往复运动（reciprocate的ing形式）；互给；报答

trans.tranCn: 互给； 回报； 报答
trans.tranOther: to do or give something, because something similar has been done or given to you
